boardgame.name: Relic Runners
boardgame.description: In Relic Runners, each player takes on the role of a character keen to exploit and acquire relics that have been unearthed in a long lost part of the jungle. Each would-be archaeologist has a colorful past _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; retired university professor, former army captain, etc. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; and wants to be the first to get their hands on the precious loot to earn the most victory points._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players must navigate a series of paths in order to visit temples. The archaeologists are restricted in their movement by their access to rations, but thankfully they can place markers on paths to allow them to travel for free in future turns. The players also have a toolkit that can be upgraded in three particular ways to break the rules in some way or offer them an advantage as they move around._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each time a player visits a temple, he takes a token. Initially the temples offer up victory points or some form of in-game bonus. When the final token is taken, a relic is placed there to be collected. The players earn large victory points for collecting relics of different types (set collection) and players can also earn bonus points for creating long routes and traveling along these to collect relics._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2013 Golden Geek Best Family Board Game Nominee
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Garrett_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Games 382 - Relic Runners and Essen M-Z
The Board Game Review room - Relic Runners from Days of Wonder

The game: Days of Wonder (c) 2013. GERMAN EDITION! All game materials are still in mint condition. Box shows minor shelf wear. Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside EU Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.

Flat shipping fee $13 for Continental USA. Free shipping with purchase of $150+. Combined shipping available. Also available for pick up in NYC (zip code: 10016). I accept Paypal, Venmo, Google wallet and Chase Quickpay. Price is negotiable if you buy multiple games.
For international shipping, UPS/USPS/Fedex rate is usually about $45~$100 depending on distance. I can also ship with other options upon request.
